experiences.description:
HR Tech & Digitalization
• Be the key project member to establish HR System.
• Conduct product operations one-on-one or classroom trainings for internal employees on changes, new systems or new procedures.
• Do the change management activities and initiatives.
• Closely work with stakeholders to analyze business and user needs, documentation of requirements and translation into proper system requirement specifications
• Identify opportunities for process and system improvements to increase efficiency and improve the quality of HR data.

HR Analytics & Dashboarding
• Initiate and produce the periodical HR Dashboard/Snapshot which covers employee attrition by different dimensions, workforce demographic, headcount update, recruitment turn-around-time, onboarding satisfaction, employee engagement transaction, etc., and provide HR insights to support for making the HR strategic decisions.
• Research and investigate to propose the best-and-common practice of HR metrics to strengthen people analytics activities.

Compensation and benefits
• Manage 3rd party service for outsourcing activities: salary structure, salary review, incentive scheme, performance appraisal, SOP, policy, conduct disciplinary measures and handle employee relation issues.
• Responsible for job analysis and evaluation, salary administration, analyze compensation surveys and obtain all necessary information to prepare compensation proposal and budgets for Field Sale staff. 
• Cooperate with Sales department to finalize incentive payout, aligned with business target. Prepares special studies and makes recommendations on subjects such as incentive compensation, bonus plans, and sales compensation.
• Plan and coordinate communications both HR and business stakeholders, to build awareness on reward programs and initiatives.
• Administer employee recognition programs and prepare reports in line with established processes
• Responsible for delivering a monthly payroll process with high accuracy and transparency for all employees (FTE,3rd party, Distributor) in Viet Nam.
• Ensures company compliance with local laws governing compensation practices
• Be in charge as a contact point for C&B questions.
